TopicTitle: Put Numbers into the VAB sliders for easier and faster tweaking of thrust

Articles.Content:
Hi

Can somene make a mod that lets you put in numbers into the sliders in the VAB/SPH that for example show the thrust limter or elctricity and so on.

When you have part heavy ships its very slow and not accurate to use the slider to limit the thrust of boosters..... It will also help to get mutliple boosters to the same number so they burn out simulatniously.

Use scenarios:

- Thurst Slider

- Ejection force Slider

- All parachute sliders

- ALL Sliders.

...

Thanks for considering!
THIS. Especially for setting amount of fuel / oxidizer in tanks... also how about for transferring exact amounts of fuel / oxidizer in flight
